display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Map Events:
• onMove → handleViewportChange
• onLoad → handleMapLoad

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Callback Props:
• onViewportChange
• onBoundsChange
• onWidthHeightChange
• onMarkerSelect
• onEventSelect

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Calls back to parent:
1. onViewportChange
2. onWidthHeightChange
3. onBoundsChange (debounced)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PROBLEM 2: Debounce Complexity
500ms delay → race conditions
viewport ≠ bounds temporarily

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PROBLEM 4: Multiple Responsibilities
MapContainer does: events, dimensions,
viewport, bounds management

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PROBLEM 1: Callback Hell
3-4 level deep callback chains
Hard to trace data flow

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PROBLEM 3: Circular Dependencies
useMap depends on parent callbacks
parent depends on useMap state

svg.text: CURRENT ARCHITECTURE: Complex Callback Chains & Circular Dependencies
